tool_description: Introducing our Text to Video API - a powerful tool that transforms plain text into captivating videos! With this API, you can effortlessly generate engaging video content from any text input. Seamlessly integrate it into your applications and services to offer users an exciting way to bring their stories, ideas, and messages to life. Enhance your user experience and add a dynamic touch to your projects with our Text to Video API today!
name: Text to Video
title: Text to Video

api_list.name: Generate Text to Video
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-video.p.rapidapi.com/v3/process_text_and_search_media"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-video.p.rapidapi.com/v3/process_text_and_search_media"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-video.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
